def_cn: 肌痛性脑脊髓炎;慢性疲劳综合征
def_en: ME is a long-lasting illness that is thought to be caused by a virus. Its symptoms include feeling tired all the time and muscle pain. ME is an abbreviation for (缩略 =) 'myalgic encephalomyelitis'.

def_cn: 我(第一人称单数宾格代词)
def_en: A speaker or writer uses me to refer to himself or herself. Me is a first person singular pronoun. Me is used as the object of a verb or a preposition.
